thread.title: Karen DeSouza Westcott
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Karen DeSouza Westcott

author: Karen DeSouza Westcott
title: Karen DeSouza Westcott
text: Our t-shirts for the Bristol, RI Elks Lodge came out PERFECT! We are going to look awesome in the United States largest 4th of July Parade, representing the Bristol RI Elks Lodge #1860. Great communication, great service, fast shipping! We will be back for sure!
